Blog.post: went to saipan hella cool place cept itz always like 90 degrees there even @ 1 am....lotta bugs and mosquitos used to be a WWII battle site...first thing i noticed, hella filipino, hawaiian, japanese, korean folks there,,,, i went scuba diving which freaked me out @ first cuz i thought i saw a shark (too much JAWS) im babbling now but i took 4 rolls of film with my zooming camera (cheap, relli) UNLIKE SOME PPL WHO HAV THER OWN FRIKKIN DIGITAL CAMERAS XD no but i'll attempt to upload a couple later... yep
inner voice #1 -hi inner voice #2- wow, ur not bitchy today! inner voice #1 *beats innner voice #2 upside the head with a stick* inner voice #666-wow i hav problems
im so damn bored! and i got bitten by like 40 mosquitos last nite! and im pissed! and itz so damn hot and humid here! and and! one! WTF (enuff of my bitching..)
i re-read Power of One....Hoppie is right-strawberry milkshakes are HEAVEN!!!

im depressed again....neaturally im gonna stay awake till 4am by drinking lipton iced tea n instant microwave espressos.......im relli pathetic also i discovered the onli cheese in the fridge is sliced american which sry to say tastes like crap after 3 firkkin months.... yep

i have realized.......via stock market u can steal more money, without legal punishment... seriously, tho, i called my mother yesterday...(she freaks out if i dont let her know im alive every 2 weeks....) and she RANTS for a hour about my "future career", n what college she thinks is good for me....im pissed now. I DONT WANT TO BECOME A DOCTOR, LADY!!!!!!!!!!!!! yet, she thinks art is a complete waste of my time.....luckily my grand dad, (my mom's dad) told her to bug off....doctor, honestly...
TIME SLOWED, REALITY BENT, 'CUZ CHEE FORGOT TO PAY HIS RENT.... I DUNNO

hi.... i went to the art class thingy.....the fucking teacher is a goddamn fucking bitch who should go kill herself quite like some pplz veiws on their espanol teacher..... i wont go into details cept my swearing..........
I've bin out a bit.....nuthing to tell bored and im becoming more violent with my words.....swear at anything that moves i dont kno... i wasnt like this before

Sauteed Veal and Fried Peppers....almost heaven i have cravings for italian food these days, sometimes i scare even myself these days im relli bored, nothing to day cept sleep....and wake up long enuff to type random s*** on this ****ing computer.....
finally stopped waking up grumpy filipina in morning..... very good methinks...

i was up till 4 in the morning yesterday...pissed off a random filipina.......dozed off for 3 hours until my grandfolks left for my uncles' and im alone.... last time i celebrated 4th of July in USA was when i was 9 years old.....BLOODY KOREA!!!!! i have cravings for pickles these days

wow i dunno if itz just me but this server was screwed up.....all yesterday.... i figure if i save enuff dimes i can buy my personal casino.... that was completely stupid i kno SHUT UP MOTHER****ERS!!!!!!!
